title: 2&half bath，Great Location,On the bus line and Walk to Schools
posting_body: Location, location and location!
Available now.

Close to Bellevue Square at Downtown Bellevue (9 min, 2.6Miles); Quick access to Microsoft (9 min, 2.4 miles), Bellevue Community College (10 min 3 miles); Bellevue College (5 min 1.7 miles); Walgreen Pharmacy (5 min walking distance); Crossroad Shopping Center (2min 0.6Mile); Walmart and LA Fitness (3min 0.8 mile); Fred Mayer, HomeDepot, Safeway, QFC and International supermarkets are all close by (2 min to 8 min).

Great schools for your children: walking distance to Kindergarten and Elementary school Stevenson ( 0.2mile Walking 4min), Middle school: Odle  (0.4mile Walking 7min); High school: Interlake (2.1mile 8min).
Also close by schools grade 6-12: International (2.1mile, 8min) and Big Picture (2mile, 5min)
Easy access to I-405; I-90 and 520 High Way.
Public swimming pool is cross the street.
Bus 221 and Rapid Ride B line are on the street.
*Bus 221 goes to Bellevue Community College, Crossroads Mall and Microsoft.
Rapid Ride B Line runs every 15minutes between Bellevue Downtown Transit Center and Redmond Transit Center, it passes Crossroads Shopping Center and Microsoft.
You do not need a car to get where you want to go!
Air-conditioner is on the main floor.
Remodel a few years ago, bathroom, wall-paints and carpets still look like new.
Has a private deck on the back and a Gazebo on the patio area.
Walk-in closet in master-bed room and a TV wall mount on wall ready for up 70" TV  in the living room .
You can hookup your own stack-able washer and dryer in the unit or you can share the attached studio's laundry place (show in the picture).
First month, last month plus $1350 deposit ($1200 refundable, $150 move-in fee) due when sign the lease.
Screening is requested for every adult over 18 years old.
Prefer long-term tenant, minimum one-year lease.
If you see this ad, it is available!
The best way to contact is calling at
show contact info
We do not check the email or text message often.
